briefTitle: PM8002 or Placebo Plus Nab-Paclitaxel as First-line Treatment in Inoperable Locally Advanced/Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind Phase III Study of PM8002 or Placebo in Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel as First-line Treatment in Inoperable Locally Advanced/Metastatic Triple-negative Breast Cancer(TNBC)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Progression-Free Survival (PFS) assessed by Blinded Independent Review Committee (BIRC)
